title: Sovereign Orchestrator | Phoenix Technologies
meta_description: Accelerate your business with the Sovereign Orchestrator from Phoenix Technologies. Automate tasks, enhance productivity, and stay compliant — all powered by sovereign AI infrastructure and built for real-world enterprise use.

headings.text: We Make AI Work For You

"AI Agents are transforming industries with scalable, secure, and high-quality experiences. Powerful AI models and seamless integrations make it a top choice for businesses aiming to reduce costs and complexity to enhance employee productivity, and drive operational efficiency."

main_content: Sovereign Orchestrator Sovereign Orchestrator is a Swiss-engineered, privately hosted conversational AI, RAG, and agentic AI platform, powered by our own IBM Vela AI supercomputer in Basel, Switzerland. Free Trial Download  (undefined, 0 B) What is Sovereign Orchestrator Unlike OpenAI’s ChatGPT Pro, DeepSeek-R1, or similar platforms, your data remains exclusively yours—never shared, stored, or accessible to anyone else. Secured by confidential computing technologies, our Sovereign AI Solution shields your information from external threats, including the US Government’s Cloud Act, and even our own administrators. Discover cutting-edge AI from a neutral country, committed to delivering unparalleled privacy. Start Now Download  (undefined, 0 B) Key Features Create your own Agents Cut costs, achieve superior results, and gain unparalleled customization by building your own AI agents—because no one understands your business needs better than you. With our team of AI experts and intuitive tools, you can effortlessly integrate your agents with existing systems, ensuring seamless scalability and maximum ROI. Highest Security The AI system ensures robust security with AES-256 encryption, post-quantum cryptography, and immutable blockchain-based server attestations, embedding protection directly into its architecture to safeguard data and maintain system integrity. Its secure pipeline uses single-use enclaves for computations and an air-gapped design to prevent data leakage, tampering, and denial-of-service (DoS) attacks while ensuring compliance and operational resilience. Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) Our Sovereign AI Solution allows you to use Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), thus ensures complete data isolation, preventing any information leakage within the system. This guarantees that your data remains secure and separated, providing tailored, accurate responses without compromising privacy. IBM VELA AI Supercomputer The platform’s computational backbone is the IBM Vela AI Supercomputer, featuring over 860 H100 GPUs and AIUs. This infrastructure delivers the performance needed for rapid model training and deployment, allowing businesses to scale and innovate efficiently. A Modern Container Platform further enhances adaptability by supporting containerized workloads across diverse chip architectures, making it a versatile solution for evolving technological needs. "AI Agents are transforming industries with scalable, secure, and high-quality experiences. Powerful AI models and seamless integrations make it a top choice for businesses aiming to reduce costs and complexity to enhance employee productivity, and drive operational efficiency." Peter DeMeo Head of Product, Phoenix Technologies AG Start Now Start your AI journey today with the Sovereign Orchestrator — your fast, secure, and sovereign way to unlock intelligent automation.
